info.title: Chat Noir Wii
info.author: TippiX
info.details:
Chat Noir Wii - A simple board game for the Wii. Don't let the cat escape! 

It is a clone of Chat Noir by Gamedesign.jp, found here: http://www.gamedesign.jp/flash/chatnoir/chatnoir.html

Big Thx to Gamer-D for the graphics!

Used libraries:
- GRRLIB
- Freetype

Chat Noir Wii is released under the GNU General Public License v2.
